select_template_prompt: Select the email template folder you want to manage:
action_prompt: What would you like to do?
action_create_update: 1. Create or Update Template on AWS
create_update_start: Starting create/update process for template in '{{templateDir}}'...
checking_template_exists: 3. Checking if template '{{templateName}}' already exists on AWS...
template_not_found_creating: 4. Template not found. Creating '{{templateName}}' on AWS...
template_processed_successfully: Template processed and sent to AWS successfully!
template_process_failed: Failed to process the template on AWS. Check the error messages above.
delete_start: Starting deletion process for template in '{{templateDir}}'...
delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the template '{{templateName}}' from AWS?
delete_folder_prompt: Do you also want to delete the local folder '{{templateDir}}'?
preview_browser_prompt: Which browser would you like to open the preview in?
preview_open_failed: Could not open in the selected browser. Is it installed?
preview_fallback: Trying to open in the default browser as a fallback...
edit_vscode_start: Attempting to open template.html in Visual Studio Code...
edit_vscode_warning: (This requires the 'code' command to be in your system's PATH)
send_test_start: Sending test email using settings from '{{jsonPath}}'...
send_test_success: Test email send command executed successfully!
send_test_failed: Failed to send the test email.
aws_cli_not_found: AWS CLI not found. Please install and configure it before using this script.
no_template_folders_found: No template folders were found in the root directory.
create_new_template_title: Let's create a new email template!
prompt_template_dir_name: Enter a directory name for the template (e.g., welcome-email):
prompt_aws_template_name: Enter the Template Name for AWS (e.g., WelcomeEmailTemplate):
prompt_email_subject: What will be the email subject line?
validation_dir_exists: A directory with this name already exists.
template_created_successfully: Template '{{dir}}' created successfully! You can now edit its files and deploy it.

testEmail.description: Enter the email address where you want to send the test
